Author: Privatoshi#9487
Content: Do you have an entry, exit, target and SL?

Author: Markus#5464
Content: use risk management when u trade, if ur trade goes to shit just exit and accept it instead of holding a loosing position that could make u end up with 30% loss intead of maybe 3%

Author: Markus#5464
Content: also never trade with whole ur account

Author: Privatoshi#9487
Content:
It sounds lame to some.
But always write down an entry, exit, target and SL.
And set the trade up on the exchange with an OCO, and exit. And don't watch it
